Empty_watchlist_text.answer: In order to add symbol to a favourites, please select one of the provided Symbol groups on the left and press the star sign.

EmptyPriceAlertTab_Description.answer: You haven't created any price alerts yet

RealStock_OpenShortPosition.answer: You are trading the real share of this company. There is no leverage or margin trading and you can only buy, but not short sell. If you want to go short (trade on a falling price), hedge your positions or use leverage simply trade the CFD on this asset by tapping below.
